title: Drive SnapShot v1.40.0.15419 [ak]
description:
Drive SnapShot v1.40.0.15419

Drive Snapshot creates an exact Disk Image of your system into a file, including the operating system, installed programs, your data and all security attributes - while windows is running and you continue to work. Drive Snapshot it allows you to backup your partition or your hard disk drive and it also can create a disk image of your system. If disaster strikes (a virus, trojan, or hard disk crash), a complete and exact restauration of your system will be possible in only few minutes. The image file can be mounted as a virtual drive, so you can easily restore (or use) single files or directories, using the Windows Explorer, or other program.



Here are some key features of "Drive Snapshot":

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ There is no restart (to DOS) necessary. Never.

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ The new Snapshot technology ensures, that all data are consistent, and reflect the PC's data at the start of backup. There are no difficulties with opened files. Never.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ This enables a very fast and easy way to backup servers and other computers, that must run 24 hours a day.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Easy Use and Restore of single Files or directories
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Drive Snapshot creates a virtual drive, containing all your drives data. You may use, compare, or restore these files directly from the Disk Image file.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ This works with any program of your choice, including (of course) the Windows Explorer
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Complete Restore of a disk in case of Disaster
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ If a disk is restored to it's original state, it will be exactly the same as at the time of Backup - byte for byte.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Restoring a system partition will require DOS; other drives can be restored using Windows
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Compatible to all Windows file systems (FAT16, FAT32, NTFS)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Compatible to all Windows RAID Methods
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Very easy and comprehensive command line interface
